doc:
Tom Shale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tom_Shale 0 Thomas William Shales (born November 3, 1944) is an American writer and critic of television programming and operations. He is best known as the television critic for The Washington Post, for which Shales received the Pulitzer Prize for Criticism in 1988. He also writes a column for the television news trade publication NewsPro, published by Crain Communications. Thomas_William_Shales ( born November_3_,_1944 ) is an_American_writer_and_critic of television_programming_and_operations . He is_best_known as the_television_critic for The_Washington_Post , for which Shales received the_Pulitzer_Prize for Criticism in 1988 . He also writes a_column for the_television_news_trade_publication_NewsPro , published by Crain_Communications .
